author: Phil
content:
04.08.15 01:52 PM
THIS GUY SAYS HE
CAN MAKE 20-
YEAR-OLD RUM IN
6 DAYS
https://www.wired.com/2015/04/lost-spirits/

Won’t know until you try its taste?

author: Peter Wright
content: Norwegian Linje Aquavits have been aged for centuries on ships sailing from Norway to Australia crossing the Equator twice. They tried to simulate the process with mechanical means but the taste was a long way off. The liquor must be more than 37.5% proof, the standard product is 40% which Elon Musk should surely consider as a fuel.
